Name: Skullbangers!
About the game: Dash, Bash and crash into your friends! Skullbangers is a lightning-paced party game where reaction speed and wit will win the day! Key Features * Pick-up-and-play extravaganza: The minimalist ruleset means that anyone can jump in and compete in an instant! * Fully customizable game parameters: Tweak every game parameter to craft your perfect ruleset * Game modes and mutators: Change between Deathmatch and the Hot Potato mode and if you're looking for a twist, enable the vast array of mutators! * Fully voice acted cast: Get to know the full Skullbangers cast and their relationships * Online Multiplayer Support: Play together with friends using the integrated Steam Remote Play Together with full controller support Best enjoyed with controllers
Meta Title: Skullbangers!: May 15, 2021, Winteractive and Full Overview
